reviews.review: Incredible, emotional rollercoaster, marvelous (pun intended). Watch it.

A truly remarkable feat was done here. There is no other franchise that has been able to be this consistently entertaining in the history of cinema. I don't know how much longer they can keep it up but Infinity War was an epic culmination of 10 years of work. Some of the characters may have been a bit underutilized but that's understandable considering the amount of people in the movie. Thanos alone was worth the watch. By far he is the best villain the MCU has produced, heck one of his henchmen in The Black Order was so annoyingly good at his job I wasn't sure if they'd be able to beat him let alone Thanos. I'm not sure how anyone can not like this movie. I may be a bit biased though, I have been reading comics for a very long time. Being a comic book and a movie lover the MCU is like a dream come true for me. I'm definitely going to see this again a couple more times. Now if we can just get WB and DC to get there act together.

I was pleasantly surprised with how this movie turned out. I liked how they chose to make Thanos hunt for the infinity stones and the heroes hunt for Thanos. Gripping and entertaining, this is truly a great movie.

i am a new person. i literally was staring at my toe forever processing everything . i have never been more traumatized in my life. i don't think ill sleep tonight...or ever. don't watch it. I regret it. im gonna go take a long shower now and think about how life is unfair. i lowkey forgot I was writing a review. im thinking of loki now...bye
i will say its one of the best movies ive seen so far, loved thanos, has action and really epic... Nice job...

The movie was amaizing and had little of everything.It had comedy from thor and the gardians and spider-man,it had a serious vibe from team cap and DR,strange and iron man(when it was for thanos or the gautlent) and vision with thor and a lot from thanos and gamora.Would recomment to everyone that have seen at least the most recent films for contex.9/10 don't like that they gave thanos a good/bad vibe
This movie changed the playing field of the MCU,
Don't read, go watch. Seriously goooo

I've never rated a movie on rotten tomatoes before. I literally made an account specifically to give this movie as few stars as possible. Imagine someone has given you a used paper coffee cup for your birthday. That's what this movie is: empty, boring, offensive. Covered in stains and someone else's germs. I don't want this. There is no use for this. No gift would have been preferable. 

What's worse--and in all seriousness, with metaphors aside--there were actual real live children sobbing at what they saw on the screen in my theater.  The creators of this movie need to take a big step back and think about who they're making these movies for.

Saw Infinity War today, i was excited to see it because not even a single one of the Marvel movies let me down (except maybe Spiderman 2 & 3).
What a fraud, the movie does not live up to the hype, the entire movie i wanted to bolt out of the cinema and ask for my money back, every single joke is crass or has not a single drop of humor in it, in the entire movie only three scenes were worth even watching, the last scene the first scene, and the subsequent one, in that order of quality. And the action was too fast paced and not well choreographed. 
The movie paces itself badly by alternating between too dull and long conversations and many action scenes that last only a few seconds because of the time constrains from having too many characters on it.
The only good thing that this movie does is open up the scene for the second infinity war movie. I would not recommend it by far.
